structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Cessation of membership -- Loss of benefits.
law.text: When membership ceases, except in the case of retirement, the member shall thereafter lose all right to any retirement allowance or benefits under KRS 61.510 to 61.705, 16.505 to 16.652 and 78.510 to 78.852 arising from service prior to the date of such cessation of membership.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 349, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 321, sec. 40. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 30. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 9.
